front.title: On the Design of Application Protocols

abstract.t: This memo describes the design principles for the Blocks eXtensibleeXchange Protocol[35] (BXXP). BXXP is a generic application protocolframework for connection-oriented, asynchronous request-responseinteractions. BXXP permits multiplexing of independentrequest/response streams over a single transport connection,supporting both textual and binary messages.To subscribe to the Blocks discussion list, send e-mail[36]; thereis also a developers' site[37].
